    FutureOrPresentValidatorForCalendar, FutureOrPresentValidatorForDate

    public abstract class AbstractFutureOrPresentInstantBasedValidator<T>
extends AbstractInstantBasedTimeValidator<javax.validation.constraints.FutureOrPresent,T>
    Base class for all @FutureOrPresent validators that use an Instant to be compared to the time reference.
